statements: UPDATE sensor_data SET camera_data = '{"resolution": "1080p"}', timestamp = '2022-10-01 08:00:00', lidar_id = 1, lidar_data = '{"distance": 100}', radar_id = 2, radar_data = '{"velocity": 50}' WHERE camera_id = 1;

UPDATE sensor_data SET radar_data = '{"velocity": 30}', lidar_id = 2, lidar_data = '{"distance": 120}', timestamp = '2022-10-02 12:30:00', camera_id = 2, camera_data = '{"resolution": "720p"}' WHERE radar_id = 1;
UPDATE sensor_data SET camera_data = '{"resolution": "high", "fps": 60}', lidar_data = '{"range": 100, "accuracy": 0.95}', radar_data = '{"target": "moving", "distance": 500}' WHERE camera_id = 1;

UPDATE sensor_data SET radar_data = '{"target": "stationary", "distance": 300}', lidar_data = '{"range": 150, "accuracy": 0.98}', camera_data = '{"resolution": "medium", "fps": 30}' WHERE radar_id = 2;
UPDATE cameras SET resolution = '1080p', location = 'Living Room' WHERE camera_id = 1;
UPDATE sensors SET reading_value = 25.5, location = 'Bedroom' WHERE sensor_id = 2;
UPDATE cameras SET resolution='4K', location='Living Room' WHERE camera_id=101;
UPDATE sensors SET sensor_type='Temperature', reading_value=25.6, location='Bedroom' WHERE sensor_id=201;
UPDATE cameras SET framerate=30 WHERE camera_id=1;
UPDATE radar SET detection_range=200, accuracy='High' WHERE radar_id=3;
UPDATE cameras SET location = 'Main Entrance', resolution = '1080p', framerate = 30 WHERE camera_id = 1;
UPDATE lidar SET scan_range = 200, location = 'Parking Lot' WHERE lidar_id = 2;
UPDATE camera_data SET image_path = '/path/to/new/image.jpg', timestamp = '2022-09-15 12:30:45' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE lidar_data SET distance = 30.5, angle = 45.8, timestamp = '2022-09-15 13:45:30' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE camera_data SET image_path = '/var/cam1/image.jpg' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE sensor_metadata SET location = 'Sensor A' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE Cameras SET location='New York' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE LiDAR SET max_range=2000.5 WHERE lidar_name='Lidar001';
UPDATE Cameras SET resolution='4K' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE Radar SET detection_range=500.25 WHERE radar_name='Radar_A';
